mapper.select: SELECT A.APP_SR_ID, A.SR_TYPE, A.WK_TYPE, A.TRG_ST_DT, A.TRG_END_DT, A.RCP_STAT, A.RVW_CONT, M.DEPT_ID, M.MEM_NM AS MGR, SUM(HR.PLN_MD) as TOTAL_PLN_MD FROM TB_SR_002MT A LEFT JOIN TB_MB_001MT M ON A.MGR = M.MEM_NO LEFT JOIN TB_SR_001NT HR ON A.APP_SR_ID = HR.APP_SR_ID WHERE A.APP_SR_ID = #{appSrId} GROUP BY A.APP_SR_ID, A.SR_TYPE, A.WK_TYPE, A.TRG_ST_DT, A.TRG_END_DT, A.RCP_STAT, A.RVW_CONT, M.DEPT_ID, M.MEM_NM
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_SR_002MT SET SR_TYPE = #{srType}, WK_TYPE = #{wkType}, TRG_ST_DT = #{trgStDt}, TRG_END_DT = #{trgEndDt}, RCP_STAT = #{rcpStat}, RVW_CONT = #{rvwCont}, DEPT_ID = #{deptId}, MGR = #{mgr}, LAST_INPT_ID = #{lastInptId}, LAST_INPT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE APP_SR_ID = #{appSrId}
mapper.select: SELECT APP_SR_ID, SR_ID, SR_TITLE, REL_SYS, SYS_NM,SR_CONT, FIRST_INPT_ID, MEM_NM, INST_NM, REQ_DT, DUE_DT FROM ( SELECT APP_SR_ID, SR_ID, sr001mt.SR_TITLE, sr001mt.REL_SYS, CD_NM SYS_NM,SR_CONT, sr001mt.FIRST_INPT_ID, MEM_NM, INST_NM ,sr002mt.RCP_STAT, sr001mt.REQ_DT, sr001mt.DUE_DT FROM TB_SR_002MT sr002mt JOIN TB_SR_001MT sr001mt USING (SR_ID) JOIN TB_CD_MT cdmt ON sr001mt.REL_SYS = cdmt.CD_ID JOIN TB_MB_001MT mb001mt ON sr001mt.FIRST_INPT_ID = mb001mt.MEM_NO JOIN TB_IS_001MT is001mt ON mb001mt.INST_ID = is001mt.INST_ID ) WHERE APP_SR_ID = #{appSrId}
SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_NO, MEM_NM, ROLE_1, ROLE_2, DEPT_ID FROM TB_MB_001MT WHERE ROLE_1 = 'ROLE_DEVE'

SELECT TB_SR_001MT.SR_TITLE, TB_SR_002MT.TRG_ST_DT, TB_SR_002MT.TRG_END_DT, MAX(NVL(PRG, 0)) AS MAX_PRG FROM TB_SR_001MT JOIN TB_SR_002MT ON TB_SR_001MT.SR_ID = TB_SR_002MT.SR_ID JOIN TB_SR_002NT ON TB_SR_002MT.APP_SR_ID = TB_SR_002NT.APP_SR_ID WHERE TB_SR_001MT.FIRST_INPT_ID = #{memNo} AND TB_SR_002MT.RCP_STAT = 'DECE' GROUP BY TB_SR_001MT.SR_TITLE, TB_SR_002MT.TRG_ST_DT, TB_SR_002MT.TRG_END_DT HAVING MAX(NVL(PRG, 0)) < 100 ORDER BY TB_SR_002MT.TRG_END_DT ASC
